texts.Unity.Payments:Errors:ThresholdExceeded: Cannot add a payment to an existing batch with a value equal or above threshold of {Threshold}
texts.Unity.Payments:Errors:ZeroPayment: Cannot submit a payment request for $0.00
texts.Setting:Payments.ThresholdAmount.Descrip: Payment threshold that triggers additional approvals and checks
texts.ApplicationPaymentRequest:Title: Request Payment
texts.ApplicationPaymentRequest:Validations:Th: There are payments in this batch that require a third level of approval. Please remove them from this batch and add to another for the appropriate level of approval
